related.meaning: Penuh, tidak ada kamar kosong, terjual habis

lessons.japanese: みんなの要求を満たすだけの食糧のない所が、世界各地にある。
lessons.indonesian: In many parts of the world, there is not enough food to meet everyone's needs.

lessons.japanese: ひとかけらのパンでは彼の飢えを満たすには足りなかった。
lessons.indonesian: A piece of bread was not enough to satisfy his hunger.

lessons.japanese: これらの便利な商品は私達のお客様の需要を満たすだろう。
lessons.indonesian: These convenient goods will meet our customers' demands.

lessons.japanese: この農園は私たちの必要を満たすに足るだけの野菜を産出する。
lessons.indonesian: This farm yields enough vegetables to meet our needs.

lessons.japanese: この農園は我々の必要を満たすだけの果実を産出する。
lessons.indonesian: This farm yields enough fruit to meet our needs.

lessons.japanese: 彼らはその条件を満たすことが出来なかった。
lessons.indonesian: They failed to fulfill the conditions.

lessons.japanese: みんなの要求を満たすだけの食糧のない所が、世界各地にある。
lessons.indonesian: In many parts of the world, there is not enough food to meet everyone's needs.

lessons.indonesian: These convenient goods will meet our customers' demands.
